 
{{Server event}}
This event is triggered when a [[/player.md|player]] stands on a [[/pickup.md|pickup]] while not in a [[/vehicle.md|vehicle]]. 
Pickups use [[/colshape.md|colshape]]s, you can get the [[/colshape.md|colshape]] of the [[/pickup.md|pickup]] with [[/getElementColShape.md|getElementColShape]] and use [[/colshape.md|colshape]] [[/event.md|event]]s to it

==Parameters==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
player playerWhoUsed
</syntaxhighlight> 

*'''playerWhoUsed''': A player element refering to the player who used the pickup

==Source==
The [[/event_system#Event_source.md|source]] of this event is the [[/pickup.md|pickup]] that is getting used by the player.

===Canceling===
If this event is [[/Event_system_#Canceling.md|canceled]], the player will not be given the item they picked up.

==Example== 
This example announces whena  player picks up a pickup
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
function pickupUse ( thePlayer )
    outputChatBox ( getPlayerName ( thePlayer ) .. " picked up a pickup!" )
end
addEventHandler ( "onPickupUse", getRootElement(), pickupUse )
</syntaxhighlight>
